sent.orig: But tomorrow I will fly, Tomorrow I will fly, Tomorrow I will fly.
sent.trans: 但明天我将远行，明天我将远行，明天我将远行。

sent.orig: Emperor: Very well, begin fitting tomorrow. I want to wear after tomorrow.
sent.trans: 皇帝：很好！明天就开始吧。我后天的巡回大典要穿。

sent.orig: I'm sorry tomorrow is all booked up. What about the day after tomorrow?
sent.trans: 非常抱歉，明天已经安排满了。后天怎么样？

sent.orig: We are going to atten in Jame's wedding after tomorrow. So we are leaving tomorrow.
sent.trans: 明天我们就要带著这个小花童趣参加她的乾妈乾爹的婚礼了，这可是她生平第一次哈，哈哈。

sent.orig: But I have a at tomorrow night, so how about tomorrow afternoon?
sent.trans: 但是我明天晚上要上课，明天下午如何？
